lead_paragraph: With just four matches remaining, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri finally acknowledged the obvious on Friday and said his unsung side were fighting for the Premier League title and could win it.

headline.print_headline: Ranieri Comes Clean-Leicester Are Going for the Title
headline.main: Ranieri Comes Clean-Leicester Are Going for the Title

snippet: With just four matches remaining, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri finally acknowledged the obvious on Friday and said his unsung side were fighting for the Premier League title and could win it....
